insert into projects (pt_id, pl_id, p_name, p_start, p_end, u_id, u_phone, u_email, ma_id, de_file, pr_file, me_file, fi_file, p_state, f_reason) values (#{ptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{plId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fiFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update projects set pt_id = #{ptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pl_id = #{plId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_name = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_start = #{pStart,jdbcType=DATE}, p_end = #{pEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_phone = #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ma_id = #{maId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, de_file = #{deFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pr_file = #{prFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, me_file = #{meFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fi_file = #{fiFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_state = #{pState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_reason = #{fReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p_id, pt_id, pl_id, p_name, p_start, p_end, u_id, u_phone, u_email, ma_id, de_file, pr_file, me_file, fi_file, p_state, f_reason from projects where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
